name: Prototype4_Demo
description:
How long can you survive on the island? Stay on the island as long as you can while more enemies spawn each round! Powerups will spawn and give the player a temporary strength boost to fight back against the enemy spheres!

Controls: ROTATE the main camera with the 'A' and 'D' keys. The player can move FORWARD using the 'W' key and the player can move BACKWARD with the 'S' key.
